向第三方提供海外参展商的个人资料​

  1. HOME
  2. 商务 / 媒体
  3. 向第三方提供海外参展商的个人资料​

About the privacy policy of sponsorship session sponsors (overseas companies)

Discord

United States of America,where Discord is located, is a member of APEC's CBPR system.
Discord adheres to the Data Privacy Framework (DPF).
For more information, please visit the following website
https://www.dataprivacyframework.gov/s/
Discord has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

About the privacy policy of Exhibitors (Overseas Companies) Using the QR System at the Booth

NAVER Cloud

South Korea, where NAVER Cloud is located, has a personal data protection system and is a member of APEC's CBPR system.
NAVER Cloud has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

Zenlayer

The People's Republic of China, where Zenlayer is located, has a system for the protection of personal information that was promulgated in 2021.
Please refer to the National People's Congress website for the Personal Data Protection Law.
http://www.npc.gov.cn/npc/c30834/202108/a8c4e3672c74491a80b53a172bb753fe.shtml
Zenlayer has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

FastSpring

FastSpring is located in the United States (California), where the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), which went into effect in January 2020, is in place to protect personal information.
The United States is also a member of the APEC CBPR system.
For more information on the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), please visit the following website
https://oag.ca.gov/privacy/ccpa
FastSpring has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

InMobi

Singapore, where InMobi is located, has a system for the protection of personal information that came into effect in 2013 (amended in 2021).
For details, please refer to the following website
https://www.pdpc.gov.sg/overview-of-pdpa/the-legislation/personal-data-protection-act
InMobi has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

KOCCA GAME INSTITUTE

Korea, where KOCCA GAME INSTITUTE is located, has a system for the protection of personal information that came into effect in September 2011 (the current law will be implemented in August 2020).
For details, please refer to the following website
https://elaw.klri.re.kr/eng_service/lawView.do?hseq=53044&lang=ENG
KOCCA GAME INSTITUTE has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

Lionbridge Games

United States of America, where Lionbridge Games is located, is a member of APEC's CBPR system.
Lionbridge Games has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

Xsolla

Xsolla is located in the United States (California), where the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), which went into effect in January 2020, is in place to protect personal information.
The United States is also a member of the APEC CBPR system.
For more information on the CCPA (California Consumer Privacy Act), please visit the following website
https://oag.ca.gov/privacy/ccpa
Xsolla has taken measures in accordance with the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."
For more information on transfers to third countries, please refer to Xsolla's Privacy Policy at
https://xsolla.com/privacypolicy/?lang=en

  • We transfer personal data in accordance with SCC (Standard Contractual Clauses)
  • Drata (https://drata.com/) is a security and compliance automation platform that continuously monitors and collects evidence of security controls while streamlining compliance workflows end-to-end and preparing for audits 3. "OECD Privacy Guideline 8 Principles"
  • The following measures of the "Eight Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines" are in place.
    • Data Quality Principle
    • Individual Participation Principle

Speech Graphics

Speech Graphics is located in the United Kingdom, which is subject to the UK General Data Protection Regulation (UK GDPR).
The United Kingdom is also a country that has obtained the Sufficiency Certification under Article 45 of the GDPR.
For more information on the UK GDPR, please visit the following websites
https://ico.org.uk/for-organisations/data-protection-and-the-eu/data-protection-and-the-eu-in-detail/the-uk-gdpr/
Speech Graphics has taken the following measures out of the "8 Principles of the OECD Privacy Guidelines."

  • Use Limitation Principle
  • Collection Limitation Principle
  • Security Safeguards Principle
  • Openness Principle
  • Individual Participation Principle

OFFICIAL SNS

  • 个人数据的处理
  • 根据 "特定商业交易法" 的规定进行说明。
